title: Вечірка
overview: First love is one of the strongest things in life. That is why the characters of the series "Party" on the TET TV channel decided to take a desperate step. One of the guys liked the girl, and to win her heart, he asks a friend to help him implement his incredible plan.Together, they decide to pretend to be the children of rich parents, make their way to the house of an oligarch who has fled abroad, and arrange a real party there, to which they invite the object of the young man's love. However, not everything goes according to plan – in the midst of a party in the series on TET, there is a complication: the owner of a large house suddenly returns.How exactly will this story end for the desperate guys from the TV series "Party" on TET? Watch and find out for yourself!
